statements: SELECT * FROM project_financial_data;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM project_financial_data WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, expenses FROM project_financial_data WHERE budget > expenses;
SELECT * FROM project_financial_data ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT project_name, budget, expenses, reimbursements FROM project_financial_data WHERE expenses > 1000;
SELECT project_name, budget, expenses, reimbursements FROM project_financial_data WHERE expenses > reimbursements ORDER BY project_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT project_name, budget, expenses, reimbursements FROM project_financial_data WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY budget DESC
SELECT project_name, budget, expenses, reimbursements FROM project_financial_data WHERE budget > 50000 AND expenses < 20000 ORDER BY project_id ASC
SELECT project_name, budget, expenses, reimbursements FROM project_financial_data WHERE project_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY expenses DESC
SELECT project_name, budget, expenses, reimbursements FROM project_financial_data WHERE budget BETWEEN 10000 AND 50000 ORDER BY reimbursements DESC
SELECT * FROM ProjectBudgets;
SELECT project_name, budget_amount FROM ProjectBudgets WHERE budget_amount > 10000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget_amount FROM ProjectBudgets ORDER BY budget_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Expenses WHERE expense_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM Expenses GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT project_name, budget_amount FROM ProjectBudgets WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, budget_amount FROM ProjectBudgets ORDER BY budget_amount DESC;
SELECT project_name, budget_amount FROM ProjectBudgets WHERE budget_amount > 5000;
SELECT project_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM ProjectBudgets LEFT JOIN Expenses ON ProjectBudgets.project_id = Expenses.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT project_name, expense_description, expense_amount, expense_date FROM ProjectBudgets JOIN Expenses ON ProjectBudgets.project_id = Expenses.project_id ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_budgets
SELECT project_id, budget FROM project_budgets WHERE budget > 1000
SELECT project_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY project_id
SELECT * FROM reimbursements WHERE reimbursement_amount < 500
SELECT project_id, expense_date FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM project_budgets WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT project_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT project_id, MAX(reimbursement_amount) AS max_reimbursement FROM reimbursements GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT * FROM expenses INNER JOIN project_budgets ON expenses.project_id = project_budgets.project_id;
SELECT project_id, AVG(budget) AS avg_budget FROM project_budgets GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT * FROM project_budgets;
SELECT project_id, budget_amount FROM project_budgets WHERE project_id = 100;
SELECT project_id, SUM(budget_amount) AS total_budget FROM project_budgets GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT project_id, reimbursed_amount FROM reimbursements ORDER BY reimbursed_amount DESC;
SELECT MAX(expense_amount) AS max_expense FROM expenses WHERE project_id = 200;
SELECT project_id, budget_amount FROM project_budgets WHERE budget_amount > 10000 ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY project_id ASC;
SELECT project_id, MAX(reimbursed_amount) AS max_reimbursement FROM reimbursements GROUP BY project_id HAVING max_reimbursement > 5000;
SELECT financial_id, project_id, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_expenses > 20000 ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM projects;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT project_name, amount FROM projects INNER JOIN expenses ON projects.project_id = expenses.project_id;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT project_name, amount FROM projects JOIN expenses ON projects.project_id = expenses.project_id;
SELECT * FROM reimbursements ORDER BY reimbursement_date DESC;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.user_id = roles.role_id;
